lexUnit.name: reprocessing.n

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: FN: the action of taking an industrial product (often spent nuclear fuel rods) and making it useful again or in a different way.

''

''
